participant_1.background:
I'm afraid of not being able to beat my competitors in the marathon.
my favorite color is pruple.
I spend a lot of time exercising and eating healthy foods to maintain my toned body.
I won't fight, but I've had to defend myself on more than one occasion.
My most valued material possession is my collection of children's books.

participant_2.background:
I try to go out for a walk or do something to take my mind off things.
I'm not a weather person.
i also eat too much french fries.
i am currently studying at union college and want to be an english teacher.
I am an aspiring male model while my mother looks after my grandmother.

content.text: Hi there, what do you do for fun?
I am currently studying at Union College and want to be an English teacher.
Oh, that's cool. What do you like about English?
I really enjoy reading and writing.
Me too, I love a good book. I also enjoy getting outside and exercising.
I try to go out for a walk or do something to take my mind off things.
That's a great way to relax. I'm afraid of not being able to beat my competitors in the marathon.
I'm not a weather person, so I don't really pay attention to the weather.
I try to stay on top of the weather so I can plan my workouts accordingly.
I also eat too much French fries, but I'm trying to cut back.
I love French fries, but I try to limit myself to a few times a week.
I'm an aspiring male model while my mother looks after my grandmother.
That's interesting, what made you want to become a model?
I've always loved fashion and I enjoy being in front of the camera.
I can see why, you have a great look
